item.description:
WATER COUNTRY, WATER PARK END OF THE SUMMER OUTING
2300 LAFAYETTE ROAD
PORTSMOUTH, NH 03801
603-427-1111
Cost: $35.99
Share gas with your driver
overcast will still go...
Carpooling: 7:30am; JanetM56; redscarlet56@gmail.com; 802-282-6202
Leaving from Exit 18, 89 The Fort, call if you wish to car pool.

Come join JanetM56 for a day in the Sun at WATER COUNTRY WATER PARK in Portsmouth, NH. Bring your non-glass lunches, sunscreen, sunglasses,water shoes, bathing suit ( change in the Park) towel, and some cash for a tube, or if you want to have lunch at the Park. Getting into the park fee is: $35.99. Will be car pooling early to get to the park early for a good upfront spot.
When entering the park at check point go right toward the wave pool and on the right are picnic tables, you will see "Meetup" signs on the table, then grab a chaise for yourself near your picnic area. This event is so much fun with "More the merryer" . Just a day of sun and fun for all.

Won't be many days left to enjoy this Summer event at Water Country
Look forward in meeting you and have a great fun in the water.

JanetM56; redscarlet56@gmail.com; 802-282-6202
item.how_to_find_us: meet up signs, to right of the entrance, where the picnic tables are

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: END OF THE SUMMER WATER COUNTRY WATER PARK OUTING
